fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Move a Strike from a player to another player.
- Prepare a Strike on a player. Strikes will activate the following morning.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Moving Strikes happens before any other actions resolve at the end of night.
- The new Striked player will be announced in the morning, as if they were normally Striked.
- Every time a new Striked player is announced, you gain an extra anonymous vote for the day.
- If two or more Striked players are alive, you gain basic defense.
